sections.heading: Local Food Infrastructure Grant Fund

Liability. sections.text: Liability. The Director, the grant administrator, the Local Food Infrastructure Steering Committee, Department employees, and any persons authorized to execute grants are not personally liable on account of the grants made under this Act and are not subject to any personal liability or accountability by reason of the issuance of the grants.
